custom.grouptype.heading: Group Type
custom.grouptypedetails.public: Anyone may view and join automatically
custom.grouptypedetails.premiumlocked: Messages/posts are not visible to non-members (Invite-Only)
custom.grouptypedetails.open: Open to all visitors for reading and replying
custom.groupsettinghelp.disablejoin: Members will have to be invited manually
